headline: Does Northrop Grumman Still Offer Value After 2025 Defense Spending Boost?
summary: If you are wondering whether Northrop Grumman at around $569 a share is still a smart buy or if most of the upside is already priced in, this breakdown will help you decide. The stock has climbed 21.7% year to date and 20.8% over the last year, with a 3.8% gain in the past week and 2.1% over the last month, indicating that investors are steadily warming up to the story. Recent headlines have focused on Northrop Grumman's role in next generation defense programs, including missile defense...
